content.section: Triple Shot is a tier 3 tank that can be selected upon reaching level 30 with "Twin", and at tier 4, can be upgraded into "Triplet", "Penta Shot" and "Spread Shot". It features 3 barrels; 1 at the front of the tank body, and 2 45Â° on either side of it. This tank has high recoil and large spread.

- While in general most people would avoid upgrading to this tank; it remains viable to use with lower bullet speeds, as you can create bullet walls by moving your cursor around in front of your tank. - Due to the high recoil of this tank, it makes for a very good unsuspecting rammer class.

- In the early days of the game's release, Triple Shot used to upgrade from Quad Tank at level 45, and upgraded to Octo Tank at level 60. - There used to be a bug in the game where by shooting and upgrading to the tank simultaneously would cause a destroyer bullet to appear. - The achievement for upgrading to Triple Shot is "Three at the same time". - Triple Shot was the fourth tank to be added to the game after 'Triplet' , with its ID being '3'.
